text: Elaija ghua otogha akar kamɨn gun atrivim mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨkeme: Nɨ ghaze, Israelɨn kantrin aven Godba ti puvatɨ, egha nɨ gumaziba amangizɨ, me Ekronɨn asem Balsebupɨn azangasa ghue. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ ua deraghan kogham. Bar puvatɨ. Nɨ kamaghɨra uan dakozimɨn irɨghɨv ikɨ mangɨ aremegham.”
